author: Staff Reporter
text:
Overall crime rate has come down in the city during 2015 when compared to 2014.

The data released by the city police stated that robbery/snatching cases had come down from 55 in 2014 to 49 and burglaries too declined from 110 cases reported in 2014 to 74 cases in 2015. In 2015, only 168 theft cases got reported vis-a-vis 338 cases registered in the previous year. Crime against women dipped significantly with just 49 cases reported in 2015 from 76 cases in 2014. One rape was reported in the city in 2015 as per the crime records bureau statistics against five cases in 2014. Kidnapping cases came down drastically from 24 registered in 2014 to mere four cases in 2015.

However, murder cases went up in 2015 with 19 cases reported against 18 reported in 2014. Similarly, total value of properties lost in crime cases had gone up from Rs 1.91 crore in 2014 to Rs 2.98 crore in 2015.
title: Overall crime rate comes down in Tirupur
